channel.description: Recent content in Submit Articles on

item.title: Site Updates: More Content For You
item.description: I’ve added a few new sections to the blog. Do check them out. Here is a list of the new sections along with their descriptions. [Projects]: Although I wouldn’t put myself in the category of an excellent developer but I can sure type in a few lines that can compile without an error and also manage to carry out a task or two. So, this page will list some of those little things that I write to weed out a few niggles or scratch a few itches of mine.
